Package imusim :: Package maths :: Module quat_splines :: Class SQUADQuaternionSpline

Class SQUADQuaternionSpline

Model of a quaternion function of time using the SQUAD algorithm.

The implementation is based on the derivation given in "Quaternion Algebra and Calculus" by David Eberly of Geometric Tools Inc.

Nested Classes

Inherited from splines.Spline: InsufficientPointsError, __metaclass__

Static Methods
 
slerp(...)
Perform spherical linear interpolation between quaternions q1 and q2 at normalised time u.
 
slerpOmega(...)
Calculate the rotational rate vector, in the rotating frame, at normalised time u as slerping between q1 and q2.
 
slerpPrime(...)
Calculate the derivative of the slerp between q1 and q2 at normalised time u.
 
squad(...)
Perform spherical cubic interpolation.
 
squadOmega(...)
Calculate the rotational rate vector, in the rotating frame, at normalised time u, while performing SQUAD(q1,q2,a,b,u).
 
squadPrime(...)
Calculate the derivative of SQUAD at normalised time u.

slerp(...)
Static Method

 

Perform spherical linear interpolation between quaternions q1 and q2 at normalised time u.

Parameters:
  • q1 - Starting quaternion.
  • q2 - Ending quaternion.
  • u - Normalised time parameter 0 <= u <= 1.

slerpOmega(...)
Static Method

 

Calculate the rotational rate vector, in the rotating frame, at normalised time u as slerping between q1 and q2.

Uses the relationship qdot = 1/2 omega * q.

squad(...)
Static Method

 

Perform spherical cubic interpolation.

Parameters:
  • q1 - Starting quaternion.
  • q2 - Ending quaternion
  • a - Control point a.
  • b - Control point b. @param u - normalised time 0 <= u <= 1
  • args - Additional arguments are ignored.
